str2: And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To dwell in, settle in, be established in (permanently), inhabit. From kata and oikeo; to house permanently, i.e. Reside.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to be 'cheer'ful, i.e. Calmly happy or well-off; impersonally, especially as salutation, be well.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.

parse: Personal / Reciprocal Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: One another, each other. Genitive plural from allos reduplicated; one another.
A gift, present. A present; specially, a sacrifice.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
This; he, she, it.
Two. A primary numeral; 'two'.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To examine, as by torture; I torment; I buffet, as of waves. From basanos; to torture.
